title: How to Wrap a Gift in a Bag

steps.headline: Open the gift bag and lay it on its side on a table or surface.
steps.description: Make sure it is the correct size for the gift. Wrap the gift in colored tissue paper.

steps.headline: Scrunch tissue paper and place at the bottom of the bag.
Slide gift into bag and turn bag upright.
steps.description: Place two small sheets of paper inside the bag between bag opening and gift on each side.

steps.headline: Make sure the tissue paper covers the gift.
steps.description: Allow the tissue paper to extend above the sides of the bag itself, arranging it neatly and attractively.

steps.headline: Tie the handles together with a small piece of scissor curled ribbon if the gift is small enough to accept this.
steps.description: Otherwise, just allow the handles to be separate. Its easier to carry it this way.

text: Open the gift bag and lay it on its side on a table or surface. Make sure it is the correct size for the gift. Wrap the gift in colored tissue paper. Scrunch tissue paper and place at the bottom of the bag.  Slide gift into bag and turn bag upright. Place two small sheets of paper inside the bag between bag opening and gift on each side. Make sure the tissue paper covers the gift. Allow the tissue paper to extend above the sides of the bag itself, arranging it neatly and attractively. Tie the handles together with a small piece of scissor curled ribbon if the gift is small enough to accept this. Otherwise, just allow the handles to be separate. Its easier to carry it this way. Finished.
sentences: Open the gift bag and lay it on its side on a table or surface.
Make sure it is the correct size for the gift.
Wrap the gift in colored tissue paper.
Scrunch tissue paper and place at the bottom of the bag.
Slide gift into bag and turn bag upright.
Place two small sheets of paper inside the bag between bag opening and gift on each side.
Make sure the tissue paper covers the gift.
Allow the tissue paper to extend above the sides of the bag itself, arranging it neatly and attractively.
Tie the handles together with a small piece of scissor curled ribbon if the gift is small enough to accept this.
Otherwise, just allow the handles to be separate.
Its easier to carry it this way.
